144.content:
The stuffed animal you were holding was a pretty big whale. More precisely, a killer whale. Being about 2 feet long, it had a night black color and contained the same white and gray spots on it's body most orca's have, including the white belly. You were amazed how life-like this stuffed animal was. Everything was right, the small fins, the curled tail and the blue, glass eyes were just how you'd imagine an orca to be like. Deep inside you realized Laura knew you better than you originally thought. Sea mammals were your favorite kind of animals, but you were too shy to admit it in front of your friends. This was because it included dolphins as well, and you had no clue how they would react. And you'd rather not find out. But Laura seemed to have forced through this layer of your inner self and had surprised you with this plush, in a good way. You thanked her, hugged her tightly with the stuffed animal still in your hand and went back to partying with your friends. It became one of the most amazing nights you had ever experienced.

When everyone had gone to their own home, you started to clean up the mess. Still slightly tipsy, you stuffed everything into the places where they belong. That's when you noticed your orca plush again. You gave it a good look and noticed something you hadn't seen before. A slight grin on it's face, almost as if it was amused looking at you, a bit unstable and wobbly walking. You smiled back, amused by the thought you made up yourself and took the stuffed animal with you to your bedroom. It didn't take you too long after you put on your pyjama's and brushed your teeth to fall asleep, holding the orca to your belly. You loved that. The feeling of soft fur against your skin.This orca was just long enough to fit between your head and legs, and so being the perfect length to snuggle in with. You whispered a "thank you" to Laura just before you drifted off into your dreams.

In the next couple of days you slept like a rock. The orca helped you fall asleep and let you forget the worries you had with your job and personal life. The relationship with Laura improved too, both because she knew you liked her present so much and you knew Laura had given you the perfect gift.

One friday evening you were lying in your bed, alone. Laura was on a holiday with her family, but because of your job, you had to say no this time. The temperature reached the freezing point of water outside, so you doubled the amount of blankets on your bed. You clinged the stuffed animal to your chest, and felt how your body's radiation warmed the fleecy orca skin. But right then you also felt something softly hitting your waist. And again, and once more. "That's weird", you thought, but when you rose up there was nothing moving. The orca was lying motionless.

"You couldn't have done that, right?", you spoke to the plush animal, slightly uncomfortable. The window wasn't open, there was no air moving in the room. "I probably imagined it", you continued, and got your self ready to sleep again. You picked up the stuffed animal, and saw to your surprise that it had it's eyes closed. "Huh?!", you yelled to no-one in particular, and wiped your eyes. You were not that tired, right? Or are you hallucinating? After you opened your eyes, you saw that the plush slowly opened it's eyes and once it noticed you were looking at him, it closed them again, really quick. "What the .." you spoke, now scared and backed off, falling to the ground next to your bed. Looking up again, you heard a faint whisper.

"Aaaand I have blown up my cover, shit, shit, shit! Why, why, why couldn't I just hold still for a moment?"

This was too much for you, it talked? Your stuffed orca talked?! And even moved! You crawled backwards, with you eyes still fixed on the orca and hit your head against the brick wall. Overwhelmed by sharp pain and confusion, you fainted.

... ... ...

"You're not the smartest kid in the world, right?" While you slowly got aware of your surroundings again, you heard a soft, female voice talking to you. You stumbled up, "Laura, is that you?", you asked, but once your eyes got sight of the room you saw it was someone different. "No silly, it's your stuffed animal, but you can call me Evelyn if you want to. I'm not so fond of being called after a fabric".

You give a slight squeak, not sure what to answer.

The plush slowly walked over to you and licked your face. Her tongue was wet, to your surprise. When you stuck your arm in there everything was completely dry. Maybe there's some hidden reservoir of saliva somewhere amidst the plush.

"Why didn't you tell me?"

"Tell you what, Hilda?"

"That you're so tasty!"

"Excuse me?"

"I'm going to eat you!"

"Say what?!"

Those last words only barely got out before you pulled your head out of her open maw. It snapped shut with the soft thud of padded latex hitting padded latex. Your plush hippo was trying to eat you!

"Stop! Please!"

"I'll stop when you're in my belly."

"How are you even going to do that, I'm twice your size!"
1453321222.title: Your curiosity wins and you feed it.

choices: Quietly sneak past her while she's concentrating
Run like hell before she finishes growing
14533212222.content:
"Oh dear, you're right. I should probably remedy that."

You gulp loudly. What the hell did she mean by remedying a 3 foot size difference? You get your answer as she steps back a little and closes her eyes. Concentrating on... something... she slowly begins to grow. You could scarcely believe it, but in seconds she got a foot taller. How she did this was a mystery, but given that she'd started talking by being fed cookies it was beginning to be par for the course. How did it even process a cookie as a starting signal anyway. This toy was either brimming with some of the most advanced technology you had ever seen or just straight up possessed. Hilda interrupted your train of thought with another growth spurt, now matching you in length. She opened her eyes again, but didn't seem satisfied with the result.

"Hmm... a little more will be needed. Just stay put, I'll get to eating you in a moment."

"I'm not gonna sit and wait here for you to inflate yourself to eat me!"

"Oooh, will you run? I do love a good chase. Playing with my prey is the best!"

The plush hippo smiled and hopped out of the bed and wandered to the middle of the room. There she lied down and concentrated on growing again. She would need to double her length at least to fit you in her stomach. You sat in mild panic, watching her slowly grow again. Just waiting to be eaten was not an option and your mind raced to find the best solution.
14533212222.title: Hilda grows

145332122222.content:
Speed would be your friend as you leapt out of bed and ran for the door. Hilda didn't move a plush muscle to stop you and when you bolted through the door to the staircase you threw one panicked look behind you. The hippo was still concentrating, steadily growing. But now there was a broad smile on her face. She was rejoicing your decision to run, for now she would get to give chase. Affirming your decision to run, you all but jump down the stairs and run for the back door. You slam into the door, frantically trying to open it. It takes a second to dawn on you that it would obviously be locked. The key was hanging off a nearby wall. You race back and forth, hurriedly ramming the key into the lock and opening the door. As you exit, you could hear a loud stumbling from the stairwell. Hilda was done sitting still and coming for you.

Your backyard was large, but almost completely empty. Luscious green grass covered all of it, with some trees left and right to break up the monotony. In the far corner was a broken trampoline, sitting under a small heap of other things you keep telling yourself you'll throw out. But far more importantly is the woods just beyond the back fence. If you were going to lose your pursuer, that would be your saving grace. The distance seemed manageable in your mind, but time was not on your side.

You ran as fast as your legs would take you, spurred on by the clamor of plush hippo feet behind you. You looked over your should to see Hilda squeeze effortlessly through the door. Your cute toy was now at least twelve feet from head to tail and gaining on you quickly. How could a stuffed hippo be this damn fast? Screaming for help was not an option. The only neighbor that would be in earshot was the old lady living to the right of you. And she would have taken out her hearing aid for the night, especially with your birthday party going on. It was you, Hilda and half a yard worth of sprinting before climbing a wooden fence. You can do this.

Hilda had other plans in mind. She quickly gained on you, opening her maw wide. It glistened with saliva in the moonlight and her rapid breathing was so close you could almost feel it. Moments before you reach the back fence she is on to you, slamming her large maw shut around your body. You shriek, expecting pain and blood, but the hippo's unreal nature didn't extend that far it would seem. Her maw, though big and slavering was still just padded latex. Even the fearsome teeth were completely soft on the inside. As such, the bite felt more like a forceful hug rather then being viciously chewed up by a hippo. "Goh you!" She mumbles with you in her mouth. She turns around and swings her head, throwing you back towards your house. You land in the grass with a heavy thud. Her bite might not have been savage, but that body housed a lot of strength. You receive another taste of it as she plants a foot on your chest. It confirms the idea that she is still mostly filled with lightweight stuffing, as the weight is surprisingly low. It was still enough to cause some major discomfort and keep you thoroughly pinned underneath her, but you knew how many tons a hippo could weigh, and what that would probably do to you.

You were trapped underneath a large plush toy who appeared eager to eat you and was by now probably big enough to do it too. But Hilda disagreed with that suggestion as she stood motionless. You tried desperately to move the foot pinning you to the ground, but could only struggle helplessly as you felt it grow. The mass pressing down on you steadily growing as well. By the time she finally got off of you, she measured at least eighteen feet. Her maw looked massive enough to swallow you whole with ease.
145332122222.title: Run like hell!

choices: Hilda ignores you and eats you.
You make a deal with Hilda.
1453321222221.content:
"I caught you! I caught you!"

The hippo was excited to have you at her mercy. She lifted her foot off of your chest, but your every attempt to get up was shut down by her nuzzling you, resting her heavy head on your torso.

"Now we play! I love playing with my prey. All of the biting and chewing, it feels great." You gulp loudly, hearing her plans for you.

"It's a good thing I'm not a real hippo, they can only play for a few seconds. Me on the other hand..."

To prove her point she took you into her maw and lifted you off the ground with ease. Her eighteen foot body meant she had no trouble fitting most of you in the saliva-coated cavern of her mouth. She opened wide and bit down on you, pressing you between the soft surfaces of her mouth. Again and again she bit down, never doing any damage beyond a firm squeeze. After a few more bites she threw you out. You landed in the soft grass with the hippo looming overhead.

"I'm so happy you ran, playing with you is great." You didn't get the chance to sputter out a response before she grabbed you into her maw again. This time your head was still outside, her thick rubbery lips pressed around your neck. Her new game was thrashing you back and forth. Her bite was firm enough to hold you into place, but her rapid shaking of the head made you dizzy. This too ended with the hippo suddenly releasing you mid-thrash to throw you across the yard.

After that she was content to just throw you around a bit, grabbing you with her big jaws and slamming you into the ground. And any time you'd just lie still she punished you with a cold lick or another salvo of chewing and biting. She wanted to see you struggle and fight, futile as it was. All the while giggling like a little girl on Christmas.

The games went on for over an hour. Every time you thought it was finished Hilda would find another way to chew you, smash you or otherwise fling you about. She even sat on you for a little bit, making you really wonder just what she was stuffed with. At eighteen feet tall she still wasn't heavy enough to crush you. More disturbingly though, you felt not just her wobbly buttocks, but also that LifeLike had gone all the way to live up to their name. You sensed the distinct impression of a vagina resting on your chest.

After the games you found yourself in her jaws once again, but now she just laid down on her big belly, absent-mindedly chewing on you a little. She eventually spat you out and looked you dead in the eye.

"Okay now, don't be afraid. But I'm going to eat you."

"Please don't, I'm only 21."

"I'm so sorry, but you're just too delicious."

"Wait!"
